      Runs the specified action on the UI thread. This method can be invoked from anywhere on the application

      Safe version of runDelayedOnUiThread where callback is surrounded by attempt to prevent it from crashing upon execution of the same.

        public static boolean runDelayedOnUiThread(android.content.Context $receiver,
                                           long delayInMillis,
                                           kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<kotlin.Unit> callback)

        Runs the specified action on the UI thread with delay.

        Parameters:
        delayInMillis - The delay in milliseconds
        callback - The block that will be executed

      • safeRunDelayedOnUiThread

        public static boolean safeRunDelayedOnUiThread(android.content.Context $receiver,
                                               long delayInMillis,
                                               kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<kotlin.Unit> callback)

        Safe version of runDelayedOnUiThread where callback is surrounded by attempt to prevent it from crashing upon execution of the same.

        Parameters:
        delayInMillis - The delay in milliseconds
        callback - The block that will be executed
